text: General of the police Vladimir Alexandrovich Kolokoltsev (; born 11 May 1961) is a Russian politician and police officer. He was the Moscow Police Commissioner from 2009 to 2012. He has been Russian Minister of Internal Affairs since 21 May 2012. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Russian politicians Category:Police officers Category:People from Penza Oblast
title: Vladimir Kolokoltsev
